price: Nuko amaze kubaha mu ngabire ze, bazigirira ubugugu maze batera umugongo (banga gutanga amaturo) baranitarura.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُواْ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
